dataverse.label: Recherche Data Gouv
dataverse.description: Module for integration to Recherche Data Gouv's "Datasets"

DatasetForm.uri-help: Unique dataset identifier autogenerated OR uncheck to insert a URL to an external file
DatasetForm.title: Title
DatasetForm.title-help: A title given to the resource. This title will be used on both OpenSILEX and Recherche Data Gouv
DatasetForm.authors-help: Entities primarily responsible for making the content of the dataset. These persons must have previously been created in the 'Administration>Person' menu
DatasetForm.contacts-help: Entities to contact for additional information on the dataset. These persons must have previously been created in the 'Administration>Person' menu and have an email address
DatasetForm.datasetLanguage-help: Language of the dataset = language of the data in the dataset (ie: a colon 'color' contains the words 'blue', 'red' and 'green' if the language is 'English' or 'bleu', 'rouge' and 'vert' if it's 'French')
DatasetForm.datasetMetadataLanguage-help: Language of the dataset's metadata (ie: the title and description of the dataset are in English)
DatasetForm.keywords-help: A topic of the resource. Typically, the subject will be represented using keywords, key phrases, or classification codes. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary and use english language.
DatasetForm.deprecated-help: Whether the dataset is deprecated or not
DatasetForm.deprecated-title: Select this option to render the dataset deprecated
DatasetForm.dataverseAlias-help: The alias of the dataverse collection to create the dataset into. It needs to already exist on Recherche Data Gouv and you need to have the right to create a dataset in it.
DatasetForm.dataverseAPIKey-help: Your API key is available here : API Token Recherche Data Gouv. You might need to create an account and to log in if not already done

DatasetList.title: Title
DatasetList.author: Authors
DatasetList.success-message: The Dataset draft : '{datasetDraftURI}' was successfully created. You can now go on Recherche Data Gouv's website to complete the metadata, add data and publish the dataset.
